# UIControl.ContentVerticalAlignment.bottom

**Case**

Aligns the content vertically at the bottom in the control.

## Declaration

```swift
case bottom
```

## Constants

- **UIControl.ContentVerticalAlignment.center**: Aligns the content vertically in the center of the control.
- **UIControl.ContentVerticalAlignment.top**: Aligns the content vertically at the top in the control (the default).
- **UIControl.ContentVerticalAlignment.fill**: Aligns the content vertically to fill the content rectangle; images may be stretched.
